function RIR_EP05_08()
    -- .承-2【2月第1週】「強がる男の子、お見通しの女の子」
    SaveData.Title = "強がる男の子、お見通しの女の子"

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ After that, many people came to visit me. ]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、ウラン（通常）、先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,100,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0323.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Loud laugh
 "Haaa—hahaha! I am the miracle cure!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,100,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "You will feel worse. Your presence is suffocating, so disappear immediately." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1616.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・wry smile・sweat
 "Now, now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The moment Lira-san saw my condition, she whispered with a surprised look. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Flustered
 "You didn’t seriously... dress as a girl just because everyone was coming!? In your condition, hospitalized like this!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1617.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・smile
 "Yes. I heard Uran-san would be here too, so just the wig and makeup." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wry smile・sweat
 "No matter how much..." ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）、ヒユ（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0400.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "Hey hey hey! We won’t allow secret talks with Erika-onee-sama!" ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）、ウラン（笑顔）、ヒユ（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smile
 "Now, now. Isn’t it fine? Because you two are—" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1166.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Surprised
 "Eh...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san and her knights looked at Erika and Lira with some kind of affectionate gaze. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Yandere
 "After all, it is wholesome for girls to love girls<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1167.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Flustered
 "Wha!? Lira and Erika aren’t like that!! Hey, Erika! You say something too!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1618.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・blushing
 "W-well, Lira-san and I are... um..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1168.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Flustered
 "D-d-definitely deny it properly!" ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, dammit. Seeing my reaction, the "Oh my, ufufu" atmosphere from Uran-san intensified. What kind of rumors on earth have been spreading? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0401.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Sad
 "Gigi! It’s true that girls with girls are the only truth in this ugly world! And from the fact that Lira-san carried Erika-onee-sama, I inferred a lot!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0402.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "Even so! Erika-onee-sama is my big sister! I won’t let Lira-san have her!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1169.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Stop saying whatever you want on your own!" ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing Lira-san and Hiyu-san arguing, I felt like I had returned to normalcy and laughed. ]])

    MSG([[ Being like this makes me forget just how desperate the situation is. I should be thinking more. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1619.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・surprised
 "...Ah." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ When I started feeling anxious, I noticed Lira-san gently holding my hand. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe she noticed I was feeling uneasy... ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1620.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・tearful smile
 (The first girl I was able to love... I’m glad it was Lira-san.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Alone, I smiled thinking of Lira-san’s kindness. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0403.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Flustered
 "S-so, now that I think about it, there are men in this room too!? What a rude hospital! It’s like putting a cute kitten into the cage of a starving beast!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0404.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "It’s outrageously rude to have Erika-onee-sama sharing a room with men! I must go protest to the director’s office right now!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "I will accompany you." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1170.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "You two are the really rude ones. Sorry, old man. It’s noisy on top of being treated like beasts..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("grandpa_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Old Man】
 "It’s fine. But, these days, young women seem to have them growing, huh." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1621.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was unexpectedly bombarded with that remark from the old man’s bed across from me. ]])

    MSG([[ N-no way... Could it be that when Akira was wiping my body, he saw through a gap...? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("grandpa_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Old Man】
 "Living a long life has its perks. I was shown a fine sight." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0324.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I-it’s growing...? No way." ]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、リラ（苦笑・汗）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wry smile・sweat
 "Ahahaha! Erika, you got caught! They must have seen how surprisingly hairy you are!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san, nice save! ...No, that save might actually be risky?! ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（通常）、リラ（苦笑・汗）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0405.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Surprised
 "Erika-onee-sama’s, that hair? Hyu, hyu—" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01gb")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0406.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Flustered・nosebleed
 "Hyuaaaaaaa!!!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1622.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・flustered
 "Hiyu-saaaan!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：リラ（驚き）
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san collapsed while suddenly nosebleeding. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Flustered
 "T-the bleeding is worse than usual! We have to take her to the hospital—oh, right, we’re already in one. Well, that works." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1623.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・flustered
 "That’s not good! Let’s call the doctor quickly!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0325.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "You especially don’t panic much, Ryuguuin." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smile
 "Women’s hair is a beautiful thing, isn’t it? And for Lira-san to even know how hairy Erika-san is..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Yandere
 "Ufu<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Ufufufufufu<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ For the first time in a while, an enjoyable time passed, and for a moment, I was able to forget my anxiety about the future. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BU：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（ウインク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "Well then, Erika, I’ll come again." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ But after everyone left and I was alone, my mood sank even deeper. ]])

    MSG([[ Behind everyone’s cheerful laughter, how many lies had I told? ]])

    MSG([[ My gender and my true feelings are all lies. Maybe this accident is divine punishment for this lying me, I thought. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "So, you were feeling down after all." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san came back. It seemed she had separated from the others and immediately turned back to come here. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt a little happy, realizing this person truly sees through my feelings... ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1624.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・wry smile
 "Hey Lira-san, I want to talk to you about something." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ So, I honestly confessed a choice I had been troubled over for a long time. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1625.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・normal
 "I’m thinking of revealing my gender to everyone. Everyone cares so much about me and even visits me— I don’t want to keep lying to them." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1626.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・sad
 "It feels wrong to deceive them any longer... Also, since I intend to ask for more help in the future, I think I should reveal the secret." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "That’s not right, Minato-kun. You’re misunderstanding sincerity." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san stepped closer and spoke to me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "I thought so. You had that face showing how painful it is to lie to everyone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1627.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・surprised
 "I-it was obvious..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "It’s been over a month since we started going out, after all. Well, I can tell a little." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "For example, I know a popular model. But actually, she’s pretty harsh behind the scenes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "She’s sharper-tongued than me. She bad-mouths her fans behind their backs." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "But I respect her. She never shows her true self during TV shoots or in front of fans. She understands what fans expect of her." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Isn’t that what we’re all doing too? We keep playing the ideal image that fans believe in. And that’s not necessarily a bad thing, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "It’s a lot worse to show the truth and shatter dreams than to perform a loved image—even if it’s a lie." ]])

    MSG([[ —That might be true. Lira-san’s words made me realize. ]])

    MSG([[ No, I actually understood I should keep playing Erica Ikusa until the end. ]])

    MSG([[ Then why did I try to confess the lie? The answer I really know too. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1628.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・sad
 "The reason I want to tell everyone the truth is... because I myself am suffering." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "You do understand. You also know what we want most from Erika, don’t you?" ]])

    MSG([[ I nodded at Lira-san’s words. Then I spoke them aloud. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1629.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・smile
 "What everyone would be happiest about is me winning against Hermes-san as Erika Ikusa." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "Exactly. Once you’ve stepped onto the stage, you have the duty to properly act as the false princess until the end." ]])

    MSG([[ Because Lira-san keeps playing a charismatic JK in the fashion world, her words carried weight. ]])

    MSG([[ The heaviness I’d felt lingering in my chest suddenly felt so much lighter. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt as if I had been given exactly the words I needed most. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Blushing
 "W-well, though, in front of me you can show everything... okay?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Blushing
 "I-it’s just that we’re… lovers… you know…" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san said this with her face bright red. Her reaction was so adorable that I tried to say something clever but nothing came to mind. ]])

    MSG([[ The words I managed to say were— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1630.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Cute..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "~~~~~!?" ]])

    MSG([[ We both blushed as we held hands. Naturally, as if drawn together, our faces moved closer. ]])

    MSG([[ And then our lips met— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //SE：引き戸の開閉音
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
WAIT(500)

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //CI：イチャつくエリリラ 135
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI135a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,1000,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Lira-poon, I brought the game console, let’s play together. I found a god-tier game." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0040")
    MSG([[
    【Erika・Lira】
 "Fugyaa!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Instead of lips, our foreheads bumped and we screamed simultaneously. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    -- 　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：素顔３号
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_SM301ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "No report needed, huh... hehe." ]])
    -- //３号

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_09")
end
